Headline: #22 Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, and Addison due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, and Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

 

Allow extra travel time.
